pages.title: Obsidilith
pages.text: Level: <level_t0>$(br2)Spawns in the $(copy:Obsidilith Arena)Obsidilith Arena$()[$(copy:bosses_of_mass_destruction:obsidilith_arena)bosses_of_mass_destruction:obsidilith_arena$()].$(br)You can locate this structure in the $(bold)Overworld$() using $(mage/spell#locate)Mana Locate$().$(br2)Use an $(key)Eye of Ender$() on the $(key)Obsidian Altar$() in the center of the arena to summon it.

$(br)During the fight, $(key)Obsidilith$() may summon $(key)Obsidian Runes$(). While any rune remains unbroken, $(key)Obsidilith$() becomes $(bold)invulnerable$().$(br2)You can destroy these $(key)Obsidian Runes$() with $(mage/spell#break)Remote Disintegration$(), or harvest them with a $(mage/prism)Spell Prism$().
